Subject: FCBRASIL - Cant apply the hotfix for the vulnerability
Description:
Hello Team,

We received the message about the vulnerability and read the patch that recommends an update for the hotfix #1. if i understood right, the patch should be available on live update already but they have a offline patch for 5.9.3.0, right?
The offline patch is not uploading, it says "error to apply the update" and the live update doesnt add a new update to be run. Can you please clarify that part?

Best regards,
